name: v1.3.15
body:
Issues included: https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/milestone/22?closed=1

## What's Changed
* Update getaddrinfo options to support IPv6 hostname resolution by @cwardcode in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1578
* Removed unnecessary _WIN64 conditional checks by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1559
* Fixed condition variable timed wait.  by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1560
* Support tls:// prefix by @konstaty in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1593

## New Contributors
* @cwardcode made their first contribution in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1578
* @konstaty made their first contribution in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1593

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/compare/v1.3.14...v1.3.15

name: Version 1.3.14
body:
Mainly a service release. Issues fixed: https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/milestone/21?closed=1

There are two significant additions, which don't affect the externals:

1. Unix domain socket support, courtesy of @fpagliughi 
2. HTTP proxy improvements:
    - the environment variable PAHO_C_CLIENT_USE_HTTP_PROXY must be set to TRUE for http_proxy environment variable to be used
    - the http_proxy environment variable to be read is lower case only
    - the no_proxy environment variable can be set to exclude hosts from using an environment set proxy

## What's Changed
* Update CMake toolchain link in README file by @sadikuar in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1412
* CMake cleanup, bump to v3.5, and submodule improvements by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1428
* Fix usage of memset by @haraldreif in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1485
* Assigned Client Identifier constant misspelled by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1496
* Exporting the -static CMake targets when both shared and static libraries built. by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1495
* Some minor hardening of MQTTProperties functions by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1420
* Zero out MQTTProperty before reading by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1498
* Fix doc comment for MQTTAsync_disconnected by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1501
* Small cleanup of OpenSSL/LibreSSL CMake by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1504
* Fix usage of realloc by @haraldreif in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1484
* Fix compiler warnings by @haraldreif in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1486
* Small cleanup of OpenSSL/LibreSSL CMake (2nd try) by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1550
* Fix IpV6 link local address connections by @jumoog in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1466
* Added support for UNIX-domain sockets for v1.3.x by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1553
* Build all the sample applications for the static library by @fpagliughi in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1556
* Fix possible memory leak by @haraldreif in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1487

## New Contributors
* @sadikuar made their first contribution in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1412
* @haraldreif made their first contribution in https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/pull/1485

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/eclipse-paho/paho.mqtt.c/compare/v1.3.13...v1.3.14

name: Version 1.3.10
body:
Service release.  Issues resolved: https://github.com/eclipse/paho.mqtt.c/milestone/17?closed=1

There are no external changes. A significant internal change is to use the poll system call instead of select to monitor sockets. Most people should notice no difference, except that poll does not exist on Windows XP as select does. You can use the USE_SELECT compile definition to switch back to use select for those platforms that don't have poll.

name: Version 1.3.0 (Paho 1.4)
body:
- MQTT 5.0 support
- WebSocket support
- Various fixes

Issues resolved: https://github.com/eclipse/paho.mqtt.c/milestone/5?closed=1

Downloads: https://projects.eclipse.org/projects/technology.paho/downloads

name: Version 1.2.0 (Paho 1.3)
body:
CMake builds, Travis/AppVeyor support
SNI support
Binary LWT payload
Optional OpenSSL initialization/termination
Many issues addressed

name: Version 1.1.0 (Paho 1.2)
body: The main features are automatic reconnect and publish while disconnected for the async client library.
